thread.title: WATCH: Real Betis officially extends Isco’s contract with HILARIOUS Ali G video
thread.title_full: WATCH: Real Betis officially extends Isco’s contract with HILARIOUS Ali G video

author: Rajveer Gupta
title: WATCH: Real Betis officially extends Isco’s contract with HILARIOUS Ali G video
text:
La Liga side Real Betis have officially extended their midfielder,
Isco Alarcon‘s contract in a hilarious Ali g-inspired video. The video, titled ‘Ali Genio Indahouse,’ humorously depicts Sacha Baron Cohen’s character as a Real Betis fan heading to the Estadio Benito Villamarin.
Ali G is seen encountering Isco in the stadium’s parking lot and unveils a Betis home shirt that depicts ‘2027’, the length until the club has extended Isco’s contract.
The former Real Madrid star joined Betis from
Sevilla last summer and has become a key player for the club under former Manchester City boss Manuel Pellegrini. He has won back-to-back Man of the Match awards for the club and has had a resurgence in form.
The new commitment signifies Isco’s loyalties to the club till 2027, taking him beyond his 35th birthday at the club, as he dedicates the rest of the peak of his career to the La Liga side.
WATCH: Manchester City’s Julian Alvarez nets the FASTEST goal in Club World Cup final history
Isco has now won over 10 man of the match awards for Real Betis
Isco’s remarkable career resurgence at Real Betis is a testament to his determination and rediscovered joy for the game. After facing a downturn in his career, including a challenging spell at
Real Madrid and a tumultuous stint at Sevilla, the Spanish midfielder found a new lease on life under the guidance of manager Manuel Pellegrini.
Isco, who had once graced the pinnacle of European football with Real Madrid, endured a period of obscurity and uncertainty but has now become a standout performer for Betis in La Liga. The Spaniard has now won over 10 man-of-the-match awards for the club with over 3 of them coming in consecutive matches.
Isco shines at
Real Betis, playing all 12 league matches with creativity and solid defense. Man of the Match in eight games, he’s vital for Betis’ European hopes. From the sidelines to a key player, Isco’s journey inspires. Calls for his return to the Spanish national team add an exciting chapter to his enduring passion for the game after earlier challenges.
